name: csharp.vim
description: This is off of the comp.editors newsgroup. I wanted to make sure it wasn't "lost" so I am uploading it to here. I have tweaked it slightly. I am not a syntax guru so please someone take it...modify it...love it! I do not know who the original author is otherwise I would give him credit in the file.
install_details: Just put it in the normal place...

versions.release_notes: A few syntax statements were updated and folding was added for #region...#endregion regions in C# files.
